docs.title: Project Overview
docs.text:
The SmartPal Project combines intelligent conversational agent (chatbot) technology, learning analytics, and gamification designs in a self-regulated learning (SRL) framework. The overarching & long-run goal of the project is to help students better regulate their own learning and achieve their learning goals in a supportive, informative, and fun environment, while empowering the instructors with automated reports and dashboard.

SmartPal is available as an iOS/Android app that serves as a personal learning assistant connected to Canvas. The app consists of four main screens, (a) a dashboard (with current grade and upcoming dues, synced from Canvas), (b) a LLM-powered chatbot for chatbot-initiated (e.g. upcoming/overdue assignment reminders, reflections, performance feedback, and goal progress notifications) and student-initiated conversations (questions about syllabus, schedule, assignments, grades, and content), and (c) a gamification leaderboard showing the top-N (typically top 20%) most-engaged students.
